attributes.action: Allow endometriosis to be a recognized chronic debilitating illness under Disability Living Allowance (& other benefits) guidelines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Endometriosis is a severe, chronic, extremely painful, debilitating disease yet it is not being recognized by benefits services. There is no cure. Women are left debilitated with pain and are unable to carry out normal daily tasks in many many cases, let alone hold down a job. We are asking the government to make new guidelines for endometriosis sufferers, especially those being assessed for Disability Living Allowance.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow endometriosis to be a recognized chronic debilitating illness under Disability Living Allowance (& other benefits) guidelines."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14623.asp
